From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Menasor receives the shots in his chest, as a few miss as he flew towards
Firearm. (The shots from Jen, if anyone is wondering). Then out of no where
came the swarm of Maximal robots, and Menasro had slight recognition of
them. They swarmed his hand, attacking and lashing it. He simply moved it
before one of the robots could hit, but Dark's hits, the blade cutting in
to the cuircutry, becoming stuck in his thick armor. At the Maximals
threats of hands off, and their attempt to tie him up, the Giant becomes
enraged. He pulls his arm that the changes have attached to, and he pulls
it hard. Power that can crush concrete, now flails whatever is attached to
his arm, in the other direction, absolutely no pressure against it, (As far
as what I understood from youre post,it is from Koj, who cant be more than
16 feet, and Menasor can easily overpower that., by the way, I dont have a
clue about youre guys cause of the profile.) " Menasor put hands on
whatever Menasor wants" his voice rumbles.

He lands beside Firearm uprighting himself, at his awesome 45 feet he looks
at the shield and with his free hand attempts to touch Firearm, and pulls
his hand back from a burn. "What, this" he says confused. But Menasor
dosent let pain stop his onslaught, so he plunges his hand into the shield,
trying to pick up Firearm, and feeling searing pain as he does, his jaw
hung in confusion.
